00022 #include <algorithm>
00023 
00024 namespace stdext
00025 {
00026   template < typename ContainerType , typename Functor>
00027     void foreach( ContainerType & cont , Functor func )
00028     {
00029       std::for_each(cont.begin(),cont.end(),func);
00030     }
00031  
00032   template < typename ContainerType , typename Functor>
00033     void foreach_reverse( ContainerType & cont , Functor func )
00034     {
00035       std::for_each(cont.rbegin(),cont.rend(),func);
00036     }
00037   
00038 } // stdext  
00039   
00040 #endif // GUARD_ALGORITHM_EXT_HPP_INCLUDED
